original_text: He must manage his own household well, with all dignity keeping his children submissive,
korean_text: 자기 집을 잘 다스려 자녀들로 모든 공손함으로 복종하게 하는 자라야 할지며

sentences.original_text: He must manage his own household well
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 집을 잘 다스려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: with all dignity keeping his children submissive
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 품위로 자기 자녀를 순종하게 하며
